# hv_ion_message_t

**Structure**

The structure that describes the Mach message that the Hypervisor sends when an I/O notifier delivers the notifications you request.

## Declaration

```swift
struct hv_ion_message_t
```

## Initializers

- **init()**: Creates a new I/O notifier message.
- **init(header:addr:size:value:trailer:)**: Creates a new I/O notifier message with the parameters you provide.

## Instance properties

- **addr**: The address of the I/O write.
- **header**: The Mach message header.
- **size**: The size of the value written by the notifier.
- **trailer**: The Mach message trailer.
- **value**: An unsigned 64-bit integer that represents the contents of an I/O notifier message.

## I/O notifier functions

- **hv_vm_add_pio_notifier(_:_:_:_:_:)**: Generate a notification when the Hypervisor issues a matching guest port I/O.
- **hv_vm_remove_pio_notifier(_:_:_:_:_:)**: Removes an existing I/O notifier that matches the specifications you provide.
- **hv_ion_flags_t**: The bitfield that you use to set the options flags for the I/O notifier.
- **I/O Notifier Flags**: Flags that you set to choose the kind of information the I/O Notifier delivers.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Sendable
